sense.def:
Kar je
new
, je nastalo ali se pojavilo pred kratkim ali pa šele nastaja.

seg.quote: ...a new type of bandage that stops minor bleeding almost immediately.

sense.def:
Izraz
new
pomeni tudi, da nečesa ni še nihče uporabljal ali imel v lasti.

seg.quote: There was another sign advertising new and used tractors.
They cost over twenty dollars new.

sense.def:
Izraz
new
pomeni tudi drugačen od tistega, kar smo imeli ali poznali prej.

seg.quote: Not long after that, he got a new job.
The villagers were suspicious of anything new.
...the newness and strangeness of her surroundings.

sense.def:
Nekaj, kar je bilo odkrito šele pred kratkim, lahko opišemo kot
new
.

seg.quote: In 1781 William Herschel discovered a new planet.

sense.def:
Obdobje, ki je
new
, se pravkar začenja.

seg.quote: ...on the eve of a new era.
A new phase was about to start.

sense.def:
Izraz
new
se uporablja tudi za nekaj, kar se je šele pravkar zgodilo. Na primer,
new parents
so šele pred kratkim postali starši.

seg.quote: Thousands were there to hear the new party leader.

sense.def:
Človek je
new to a situation or place
ali pa so okoliščine ali kraj
new to someone
, če tistega še ni doživel ali videl nikoli prej.

seg.quote: ...a person who's new to the job of teaching.
...a part of England completely new to him.

sense.def:
News
so obvestila o dogodkih ali spremembah, ki so se zgodile pred kratkim.

seg.quote: I've got some good news for you.
...after receiving the news of my acceptance.

sense.def:
News
so tudi obvestila v časopisih, na radiu ali televiziji o tem, kar se je v zadnjem času zgodilo v državi ali po svetu.

seg.quote: ...a half hour of world and domestic news.
It was on the news at 9.30.
